definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Kariaqaim (perh. double city (du.), yet in gen. on [[יִַ֠ם]] in n.pr.loc. v. Ges:§ 88 c);—

in Moab (MI:10) Je 48:1 ([[תָָיִם]]-), v:Je 48:23, so [[קִיׇתָָיְמָה]] Ez Eze 25:9 Qr (Kt [[קריתמה]]); Reubenite city acc. to Nu 32:37 ([[תָָיִם]]-) Jos 13:9; [[שָׁוֵה קִרְיׇתָָיִם]] Ge 14:5 plain of Ḳiryathaim (v. [[שָׁוֵה]]); mod. Ḳurêyât, c. 1 1/4 m. SE. from (Mt.) ‘Aṭṭarus ([[עֲטָרוֹת]]), and 6 3/4 m. NNW. from Dibon; GASm:Geogr. 567 f. Buhl:Geogr. 267.
Levit. city in Naphtali 1Ch 6:61, = ‖[[קַרְתָּן]] Jos 21:32 (Qemmwn, LXXL Karqan).
